infoArray.name: children
infoArray.desc: The content of the expansion panel.

infoArray.name: classes
infoArray.desc: Useful to extend the style applied to components.

infoArray.name: CollapseProps
infoArray.desc: Properties applied to the Collapse element.

infoArray.name: defaultExpanded
infoArray.desc: If true, expands the panel by default.

infoArray.name: disabled
infoArray.desc: If true, the panel will be displayed in a disabled state.

infoArray.name: headerStyle
infoArray.desc: Defines style the header of expander.

infoArray.name: contentStyle
infoArray.desc: Defines style the content of expander.

infoArray.name: onChange
infoArray.desc: Callback fired when the expand/collapse state is changed.
